title: Weresquirrel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock your target. You may do this on a new moon and a full moon. You may do this on a Hunting Moon.
- During Full Moons, learn 3 roles your target might be.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Investigation results are shared with other Weres.
- You cannot target other Weres
- You are Roleblock Immune

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**Places You Shouldn't Be**
You will learn your target's exact role instead

desc:
Post 533
*Just try to keep walnuts away from this guy if he's even doing parkour in your backyard.*
